++++ DIRECTIONAL VS NON-DIRECTIONAL TIRES
  * Directional
    * one-way tread pattern optimized for the direction of rotation
    * they're specifically made for either the left or right side.
    
    * Should have arrows or triangles on sidewall indicating rotation direction.
  
  * Non-Directional or (symmetric tread pattern) 
    * Designed so that they can be mounted on any wheel.
